LanguageData.ZeroTechAniImp.label: Animal implant module
LanguageData.ZeroTechAniImp.description: Sometimes, we need some friends outside of humans and machines, and when the evolution of these friends can't keep up, we can consider helping them through technology.
LanguageData.ZeroTechBodyPart.label: Body replacement module
LanguageData.ZeroTechBodyPart.description: When you think that your original body is not suitable for the environment, perhaps directly replacing the whole is not the best way, but it must be the fastest way.
LanguageData.ZeroTechImplant.label: Body strengthening module
LanguageData.ZeroTechImplant.description: Instead of directly replacing the original body with non-biological parts, strengthening the body with various implants may be a better idea.
LanguageData.ZeroTechMesImp.label: Mechanical expansion module
LanguageData.ZeroTechMesImp.description: The mechanical installation of external modules is obviously much more convenient than the human body. Of course, if you choose to treat machinery as life, and then expand on this basis, that is another difficulty.
